style_property.title: Staff message new message indicator
style_property.description: Usually a small token attached to the message block, the indicator that a message is new/unread is controlled here

style_property.title: Staff message indicator
style_property.description: Any rules used to apply styling to users' signatures in their messages are defined here

style_property.title: Staff message user info block
style_property.description: Apart from its width, the (left) message user info column is styled here

style_property.title: Thread starter message new message indicator
style_property.description: Usually a small token attached to the message block, the indicator that a message is new/unread is controlled here

style_property.title: Thread starter message indicator
style_property.description: Any rules used to apply styling to users' signatures in their messages are defined here

style_property.title: Thread starter message user info block
style_property.description: Apart from its width, the (left) message user info column is styled here

style_property.title: Web app background color
style_property.description: This color is used on the splash screen when the web application is first launched.

style_property.title: Web app icon (192x192)
style_property.description: Icon should be in png format. Icons are used in places like the home screen, app launcher, task switcher, splash screen, etc.

style_property.title: Web app icon (512x512)
style_property.description: Icon should be in png format. Icons are used in places like the home screen, app launcher, task switcher, splash screen, etc.
